items.sentence: An incident similar to this one happened last year as well.
Getting divorced was one of the best things I've ever done.
I don't know enough French to make out what they're saying.
Mary isn't what I'd call beautiful, but she is very pretty.
I couldn't help but let out a chuckle at Tom's cheesy joke.
If Tom had started earlier, he'd be done doing that by now.
I don't think that something like that would embarrass Tom.
Tom thought that Mary was joking, but she was very serious.
Another woman as good as your ex-wife will be hard to find.
Every time Tom looked at Mary's picture, he started crying.
